ghostPage.title: Developer Tools
ghostPage.excerpt:
Our personal collection of "cool shit," ranging from Python libraries, NPM
packages, or SaaS products we find particularly interesting.

authors.name: Todd Birchard
authors.bio: Product manager turned engineer with an ongoing identity crisis. Breaks everything before learning best practices. Completely normal and emotionally stable.
